Package cis.project1

Class Trick

  • java.lang.Object
    • cis.project1.Trick
  • public class Trick
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a standard playing card "trick" or one card play from each game player.
    Version:
    Summer 2019
    Author:
    Andrew Weston, Christian Thompson

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Trick​(Player firstPlayer)
      This constructor creates a Trick object with the specified first player, and leading card.
      Trick​(Player firstPlayer, Card led)
      This constructor creates a Trick object with the specified first player, and leading card.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void add​(Card newCard, Player p)
      This method adds the specified card to the trick on behalf of the specified player.
      Card getLed()
      This getter method returns the card that was led (or played first).
      Card getLosing()
      This getter method returns the Card that is losing "this" Trick object.
      Player getStarter()
      This getter method returns the Player who started "this" Trick object by playing the first card.
      Player getTaker()
      This getter method returns the player who is losing "this" Trick object.
      java.util.LinkedList<Card> getTrick()
      This getter method returns "this" Trick object.
      boolean isComplete()
      This getter method returns whether "this" Trick is complete.
      void setComplete​(boolean completeness)
      This setter method modifies the Trick completion state.
      java.lang.String toString()
      This method overrides the Object toString() method.

        public void add​(Card newCard,
                Player p)
        This method adds the specified card to the trick on behalf of the specified player.
        Parameters:
        newCard - is the card that the player played.
        p - is the player who played the card.

        is the collection of Card object's representing the Trick.

      • getTaker

        public Player getTaker()
        This getter method returns the player who is losing "this" Trick object.
        Returns:
        is the player with the highest trump suit card in the trick.

      • getStarter

        public Player getStarter()
        This getter method returns the Player who started "this" Trick object by playing the first card.
        Returns:
        is the first player for "this" Trick.

      • getLed

        public Card getLed()
        This getter method returns the card that was led (or played first).
        Returns:
        is the first Card added to the Trick.

      • getLosing

        public Card getLosing()
        This getter method returns the Card that is losing "this" Trick object.
        Returns:
        is the Card with the highest rank of trump suit in the trick.

      • isComplete

        This getter method returns whether "this" Trick is complete.

        is true when the Trick is complete.
